title: CLSU College Admission Test Online Application System
description: A web-based admissions portal that transformed the traditional in-person process into a fully online system.
contributions: Designed and developed the entire system using PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, and REST API.
Built an end-to-end online application workflow, replacing manual, paper-based submissions.
Integrated Gemini API for AI-powered photo verification to ensure applicants met strict ID photo requirements.
Optimized user experience for accessibility, reducing manual workload and eliminating long queues.
impact: Increased the number of applicants each year, breaking all-time student application records.

title: CLSU Thesis/Dissertation Formatting Systems
description: A document processing tool that automatically applied official university formatting guidelines to academic manuscripts.
contributions: Built a formatting system with Laravel, PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, and REST API.
Enabled students to create manuscripts and instantly generate format-compliant versions, removing dependency on third-party formatting services.
Reduced faculty review time by ensuring submissions adhered to official formatting requirements.
impact: Eliminated the need for students to pay third-party services for thesis formatting.

title: CLSU Faculty Performance Evaluation System
description: A modernized platform for conducting faculty performance evaluations and generating real-time reports.
contributions: Rebuilt and maintained the evaluation platform using Laravel, PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, and REST API.
Designed and implemented a normalized database schema for scalability and improved performance.
Delivered real-time evaluation reports, reducing manual work for administrators and improving decision-making.
(Legacy System Contribution) Integrated Gemini API to summarize faculty evaluation feedback, enhancing report readability.
impact: Streamlined evaluation workflow and improved accessibility of faculty evaluation data.
